name: Data Scientist
description: Analyze data to gain insights and make informed decisions.
requirements: Experience with Python and machine learning

name: Product Manager
description: Lead product development from conception to launch.
requirements: Experience in product management and agile methodologies

name: UX Designer
description: Design user interfaces that are intuitive and user-friendly.
requirements: Experience with design tools such as Figma or Sketch

name: DevOps Engineer
description: Maintain and improve the infrastructure and deployment processes.
requirements: Experience with AWS and CI/CD pipelines

name: Marketing Manager
description: Develop and execute marketing strategies to drive growth.
requirements: Experience with digital marketing and SEO

name: Sales Representative
description: Sell products and services to potential customers.
requirements: Experience in sales and excellent communication skills

name: Customer Support Specialist
description: Provide assistance and support to customers.
requirements: Experience in customer service and problem-solving skills

name: Network Administrator
description: Maintain and manage the company's network infrastructure.
requirements: Experience with network protocols and security

name: HR Manager
description: Oversee the HR department and manage employee relations.
requirements: Experience in HR management and labor laws
